nodes.text: Kuari Souvenirs was a shop aboard the luxury liner Kuari Princess, located on the Bazaar Deck. It was run by an old lady named Vern during the Galactic Civil War, and amongst its wares were a crystal mood-vase, a pair of mounted Bantha horns, two Anorelgan slip-sockers, along with holo-chits of the Kuari Princess and its ports of call.
